## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Testing

- [ ] I have tested this change locally
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass (`npm run test:e2e`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] TypeScript compilation succeeds (`npm run build`)

### For Recipe Contributions

- [ ] Recipe follows the JSON schema format
- [ ] All three language translations provided (EN/ES/FR)
- [ ] Nutrition information is accurate
- [ ] Recipe is not a duplicate
- [ ] Images are optimized and properly referenced
- [ ] Recipe validated with `npm run validate:json`

### Accessibility

- [ ] Changes are keyboard accessible
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
- [ ] Screen reader compatible
- [ ] Focus indicators are visible

### Performance

- [ ] Changes don't negatively impact bundle size
- [ ] Images are optimized
- [ ] No console errors or warnings in production build

## Additional Notes

<!-- Any additional information reviewers should know -->

**Reviewer Guidelines:**

Please review:
1. Code quality and adherence to project standards
2. Test coverage for new features
3. Documentation accuracy
4. Accessibility compliance
5. Performance impact
